response.original_title: My Cousin’s Big Fat Durban Wedding
response.overview: When reality TV star Kieran’s long-lost cousin Anushka asks him to plan her dream wedding in three weeks, he’s all in, until he discovers her mysterious groom is someone from his painful past. With family chaos, culture clashes, and comic relief from Granny Aaiya, Kieran must decide whether to expose the truth or let his cousin’s fairytale wedding go on.
response.title: My Cousin’s Big Fat Durban Wedding
